name: Medical Coding Company
description: Organization providing medical coding and documentation services
obligations: Use PHI only for specified purpose, implement security measures, report breaches

name: IT Service Provider
description: Information technology support and system management services
obligations: Maintain system security, monitor access, report incidents, provide breach notification support

name: Billing and Collections Firm
description: Healthcare revenue cycle management and patient billing services
obligations: Protect billing PHI, maintain confidentiality, implement access controls, respond to inquiries

name: Legal Counsel
description: Law firm providing HIPAA compliance and healthcare law services
obligations: Maintain attorney-client privilege, implement confidentiality, follow access controls

name: Accounting Services
description: Accounting and auditing firm handling healthcare financial records
obligations: Secure financial PHI, implement audit controls, maintain records, report discrepancies

name: Patient Scheduling Service
description: Third-party vendor managing appointment scheduling and reminders
obligations: Protect patient contact information and appointment details, implement security, handle breaches

name: Cloud Storage Provider
description: Third-party cloud computing and data storage services
obligations: Encrypt data at rest and in transit, maintain access logs, report breaches immediately

name: Medical Transcription Service
description: Transcription of clinical notes and medical documentation
obligations: Maintain confidentiality of transcribed PHI, implement access controls, secure data transmission

name: Email and Communication Service
description: Secure messaging and communication platform provider
obligations: Encrypt communications, implement authentication, maintain audit trails, report breaches

name: Background Check Vendor
description: Pre-employment screening and background verification services
obligations: Use workforce PHI only for verification, maintain confidentiality, implement security
